text: Insan ka haal yeh hai ke jab uspar koi sakht waqt aata hai to khade aur baithey aur letay (lying) humko pukarta hai, magar jab hum uski museebat taal dete hain to aisa chal naikalta hai ke goya usne kabhi apne kisi buray waqt par humko pukara hi na tha. Is tarah hadd se guzar janey walon ke liye unke kartoot khushnuma bana diye gaye hain
